byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Patrick McGeehan, Colin Moynihan and Rebecca White in New York; Nate Schweber in Linden, N.J.; and Matthew Siegel in Sydney, Australia.

snippet: After a helicopter crashed into the East River on Tuesday, killing one, an early review by federal investigators turned up no obvious signs of a major mechanical failure.
lead_paragraph: After a helicopter crashed into the East River on Tuesday, killing one, an early review by federal investigators turned up no obvious signs of a major mechanical failure.

headline.main: Pilot Cites Engine Failure in Copter Crash; Early Inquiry Inconclusive
headline.print_headline: Pilot Cites Engine Failure; Early Inquiry Inconclusive
headline.seo: No Signs of Mechanical Failure in Helicopter Crash
